alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:27PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Converse County through 500 PM MDT... At 426 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Glenrock, or 14 miles east of Casper, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Converse County. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 168 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
